title: Roasted shoulder of pork with Parisienne potatoes, glazed carrots and Oxford sauce
description: Round little balls of potato fried in butter make a cute side dish to pulled pork in this great Sunday roast recipe.
ingredients: 4 large carrots, top and tailed and peeled but left whole
1 orange, finely sliced zest and juice
1 lemon, finely sliced zest and juice
